high_descs: Turn around and go near the bed.
Take the knife from the bed.
Turn around and go near the desk lamp.
Put the knife near the desk lamp and it will be glow.
anns.task_desc: Placed the knife near the desk lamp and it will be glow.

high_descs: Turn right and head straight, then hang left towards the bed.
Pick up knife from the bed.
Turn right and head straight, make left and then again hang left towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a knife by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: walk towards the bed in the bedroom
pick up the knife from the bed
turn towards the desk lamp while holding the knife
turn on the desk lamp light
anns.task_desc: turn on the desk lamp while holding a knife
